attributes.action: People weighing over 25 stone should be offered a 'fat camp'
attributes.additional_details:
If you are extremely over weight you should be offered the following.
- Classes on healthy eating
- 3 exercise classes a week
- A weekly weigh in
All under the supervison of your GP.

This will, in the longer term, save the NHS money by reducing heart disease, diabetes and other weight related conditions.
